OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD PARTNERSHIP RIVERS IN TOWN ENVIRONMENTS (SPRITE)

Desc.entry: Aims to promote and conserve a healthy river corridor for the benefit of wildlife and the community. Organises litterpicking, vegetation management and habitat improvement that will benefit general biodiversity and responsible public access with concern for fauna and flora in the vicinity. Offers free angling coaching for youngsters and educational packages. Covers the Don corridor between Hillfoot Bridge and Oughtibridge. Company limited by guarantee 06841169.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Seasonal, please contact for further details
